main event: On 5 November 1950 at 1155 hours, Mr. observed an unidentified flying object in Oak Ridge, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object changed shape rapidly, appearing translucent,The object's changes in size were described as rapid and darting,The witness indicated that the object moved at a very high speed,The observer, employed with significant experience in aviation, had been tracking UFO sightings for over 12 years,The weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object that changed shapes rapidly
witness description: Mr. who has been employed as an illustration draftsman with over 16 years of experience and trained by security officials at ERDA.
